attributes.action: ask goverment to review the current smoking ban in public houses. We feel it should be up to the publican whether to allow smoking, except when serving main meals in which case smoking will not be permitted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the blanket smoking ban is harmful to our local pubs. We plead with the Prime Minister to ask goverment to review the current ban and allow the Publicans to decide whether or not to enoforce the smoking ban except where serving main meals in which case smoking will not be permitted.
